_meta.notes: Minimal manual seeds - ranges only, no scraping

airports.name: Noi Bai International Airport

taxi_to_center.notes: Use official taxi (Mai Linh, Vinasun) or Grab. ~30-45 min.

legit_transport.name: Bus 86
legit_transport.notes: To Hanoi Railway Station. Orange express bus.

legit_transport.name: Grab
legit_transport.notes: Fixed price shown. Meet at pickup zone.

legit_transport.name: Mai Linh/Vinasun Taxi
legit_transport.notes: Green (Mai Linh) or white (Vinasun). Insist on meter.

scam_warnings: Confirm meter is reset and running
Watch for fake taxi company logos
exit_tips: Get SIM card at arrivals - Viettel or Mobifone
VND only - withdraw at airport ATM

coffee.notes: Cà phê sữa đá (iced) ~15k-25k street, ~35k-50k cafe, ~60k-80k specialty

beer.notes: Bia hơi (fresh) ~10k-15k, bottled at bar ~25k-40k, tourist bar ~50k-60k

tipping.notes: Not traditional. Round up at restaurants. 50k-100k for exceptional service.

payment.atm_notes: ATMs have low limits (~2-3M VND). Techcombank, Vietcombank reliable. ~50k fee.

etiquette: Two hands when giving/receiving from elders
Bargaining expected at markets (not in shops with prices)
scam_warnings: Shoe shine boys: may demand high prices
Taxi: use Grab or Mai Linh/Vinasun only
Street vendors: confirm price before ordering
safety_tips: Traffic is chaotic - cross slowly and predictably
Bag snatching from motorbikes - be aware
Drink bottled water, ice usually safe in tourist areas
